alert.note: Alert for Washington (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued February 03 at 11:45AM CST until February 03 at 2:45PM CST by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...FLASH FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 245 PM CST THIS AFTERNOON FOR NORTHWESTERN PEARL RIVER COUNTY AND NORTHEASTERN WASHINGTON PARISH... At 1145 AM CST, Doppler radar indicated thunderstorms producing heavy rain across the warned area. Between 2 and 3 inches of rain have fallen. Additional rainfall amounts of 1 to 2 inches are possible in the warned area. Flash flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly. HAZARD...Life threatening flash flooding. Thunderstorms producing flash flooding. SOURCE...Radar. IMPACT...Life threatening flash flooding of creeks and streams, urban areas, highways, streets and underpasses. Some locations that will experience flash flooding include... Bogalusa, Varnado, Crossroads and Angie. This includes the following Interstates... Interstate 59 in Mississippi near mile marker 42. FLASH FLOOD...RADAR INDICATED FLASH FLOOD DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
